title: Help to find the font of this logo
content:
I'm looking for the font of this logo for a graphic work. Can anyone help?

Thank you!

Font: 

 Enter Sansman Bold 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192728/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Leveflex-font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192728/http:/typophile.com/files/Leveflex-font.jpg) | 46.14 KB |
author: laisaandrade7

comments.content:
The free font Sansman Bold is very close, save for the stroke ends (see the capital F):  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Enter-Sansman-Bold.font?text=LevFlx](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192728/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Enter-Sansman-Bold.font?text=LevFlx "http://www.whatfontis.com/Enter-Sansman-Bold.font?text=LevFlx")

So that means if you want a dead-on match, it has to be Serpentine:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/serpentine/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192728/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/serpentine/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/serpentine/")

Why is the ID on this labeled as Enter Sansman Bold, when it's not a match?  
Serpentine is closer. I thought we were making it a practice to not point people to free, low-quality fonts in this forum.
It is a practice on this forum to not point people to pirated fonts. Free low-quality ones, I don't know.
